snippet: Weeks after two people were killed after being pushed into the paths of trains, officials have added more messages telling passengers to stand clear of the platform edge.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority increases frequency of messages warning passengers to stand clear of subway platform edges; move follows recent deaths of two people who were shoved into the paths of oncoming trains.
lead_paragraph: Weeks after two people were killed after being pushed into the paths of trains, officials have added more messages telling passengers to stand clear of the platform edge.

headline.seo: After 2 Deaths, Subway Riders Hear More Warnings to Stand Clear
headline.main: On Subway Platforms, More Warnings for Riders
headline.print_headline: In Subway, An Increase In Warnings For Riders
